name: Geek Powered Studios
tagline: Internet marketing service in Austin, Texas
description: Geek Powered Studios was established in 2009 as a means for its founder, Guillermo Ortiz, to supplement his income working as an in-house web designer in San Antonio Texas. Through his work in web design, Guillermo began hearing about ‘SEO’ and how valuable it was becoming to the success of small businesses. A chance encounter with the CEO of Nutronics Labs, Rick Lentini, led Guillermo to pursue internet marketing full time under the Geek Powered banner.
